name: check_in
description: <!-- I want to be able to input a given product or a brand and see some gifs from giphy.com that match my search term. This way I can get a snapshot of how people are relating to my client's products. --> create a form for client's request  When client enter a search term  pull from the GIPHY API a set of relate gifs  render on the browser  /// storing  if the client would like to save a specific search  create a form to save for later reference
